About Burger King Burger King is a Fast Food restaurant located at 706 W Perkins Ave in Sandusky, OH 44870. Burger King has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No

Burger King Tips Sooooooo slow omg there slow!
Gerrett H. Extremely slow!!!! We sat in line for over five minutes before we even paid for our food and we still had to wait at the window to receive the food.
Jennie T. This is the worst burger king I've been to. They're extremely slow and the girl working the front counter has a major attitude problem towards the customers.
